title: My Darling
description: A new couple moves in next door.And nothing will ever be the same again…I watched you move in and thought we might be friends.I saw you watching from the window – and knew I’d have to keep you away from my husband.I started to trust you. Confide in you.I started to mistrust you. Suspect you.I was confused when I blacked out after an evening at your place. Was I really that drunk?I came up with a plan. A plan to make you both pay . . .
author: Amanda  Robson
